name: The Lone World
description:
The Lone World is a game I created in two weeks (and polished up a few odds and ends in the following week). This game was to challenge myself to release something without falling into endless scope creep.

It's a short game but I hope you enjoy it!

Controls
Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
Interact/Confirm: Z
Crouch: Down Arrow Key / S
Jump: Space
Double Jump: Space x2
Shoot: e

Story
Join an explorer as she returns to The Archstation only to accidentally stumble
upon an uncharted planet. Crash landing on this unknown world, she ventures off to seek a new way home.
